content:
Who drew the SANER logo?

I am in love with it.

![Saner Logo](https://github.com/AudaciousInquiry/fhir-saner/blob/master/SANERLogo.png)
Also, it's always such a crapshoot which markdown tags will be ok to Zulip.

It was drawn by my eldest's partner. And my youngest drew this:
![My Avatar](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1244484586303827969/YV8R4rFN_400x400.jpg)
I kinda want to get it printed on a t-shirt... Think your eldest's partner would be ok with that? :)

I think they would, and so long as you aren't selling T-shirts or using it to promote a commercial venture, that's covered under fair use I think. And since I'm the one who commissioned the art, I'm surely not going to fuss at you. We do want to use it to promote The Saner Project.
Perhaps HL7 could co-ordinate a 'print run' of T shirts? I surely want one (Large size please)... :)
